response.summary: An invoice from Beispiel Firma GmbH to Alice Müller. It carries the invoice number RE-2013-12345 with date 11.05.2023. The document lists three items: Gabeln (15 pieces at 10 € each), Messer (10 pieces at 5 € each), and Löffel (3 pieces at 25 € each). Net amount is 275.00 €, plus 19% VAT (52.25 €), totaling 327.25 €. The payment is requested by 25.05.2015 using the reference RE-2013-12345.
response.title: Rechnung Beispiel Firma GmbH
response.creator: Beispiel Firma GmbH
